name: Clin N
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional lymph nodes and lymph nodes, NOS in this field.  Distant lymph nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 2:** Assign N1 if regional lymph nodes are involved but there is no indication of the number of nodes involved.

**Regional lymph nodes for small intestine**

**All small intestine sites**

    Regional lymph nodes, NOS
    Lymph nodes, NOS

**Duodenum primaries only (C17.0):**

    Duodenal
    Gastroduodenal
    Hepatic
    Pancreaticoduodenal
    Pericholodochal (common bile duct)
    Pyloric: infrapyloric, subpyloric
    Superior mesenteric
       
**Jejunum primaries only (C17.1):**

     Mesenteric, NOS:
     Superior mesenteric

**Ileum primaries only (C17.2):**

     Cecal (anterior, posterior, retrocecal) 
     Ileocecal       
     Mesenteric, NOS
     Superior mesenteric
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Unknown; regional lymph nodes not stated
Not documented in patient record
Metastasis in 4 or more regional lymph nodes
